posts.content:
Not mine but here http://www.gumtree.com/london/23/63333523.html

Anyone seen it in the flesh, seems good price, £5,500

If it seems too good to be true.................

http://cgi.ebay.co.uk/1966-VW-Deluxe-Sp ... 1c14a85ce6

Yet another gumtree special!
lots of scams going on gumtree.....theres normally no contact num just a email be catefull...............

It's was on pistonheads for 8500 aswell and has already been reported as a scam... I received an email with the standard..... I'm in hospital so please send money to account and I will get it delivered to you.. Blah blah blah!!!
Perhaps we should all ask for his bank account to send the money too.....

Always the way though, if it looks to good a deal...


Funny that eBay list the van as in Hull for £12k and gumtree in London for £5,500!

Makes you wonder how stupid people can be.

Anyway I've already sent him my cheque so look forward to receiving a new van!!

Scammer for sure.

Gotta love his response.
Good evening,
Sorry that I have given no response. I'm in hospital in Newcastle-upon-Tyne. I had surgery. And had to stay in hospital at least three weeks.
The campervan is still for sale, price that I'm asking is £5,500.00. bodywork & mechanical in excellent condition.
No scratches or any kind of damage. I had a buyer from Durham but his loan was not approved and now the campervan is still for sale. Delivery is already paid and as I explained my buyer couldn't get the loan after I made the arrangements to deliver the campervan, and the delivery company won't refund me, but I am able to deliver the campervan anywhere in United Kingdom. As I'm in hospital due to my health problems I can't do this transaction personally but the transaction will be made through Trans International Cargo for our own safety. If you want to buy it I just need your full name and address so I can open a case. You must know that Trans International Cargo will contact you without any obligation to buy it or fees.
Cheers
 
MOT Expiry: Jul 2011
Tax FREE

tombailley77

dude the bug in your pic i used to own that,when did you buy it,always regret selling it

cheers colin..

Colin, it was my bug. I rebuilt it, are you the fella I discussed this bug with in the lost and found section of VZi?

I sold years back now, 2002? Not sure where it is now, I regret selling it too, always looking out for it for sale.

Cheers, Tom
The split is also an old ride of mine, 57 oz rhd, and regret selling that also. Would buy it now if I saw it, now running a rhd '60 crew cab.
